title: Digital Product Passport (Minimalist Normative Header Schema)
description: A minimalist, normative schema for the DPP that validates core headers and allows for flexible, user-defined properties in the payload.

digitalProductPassportId.description: The unique identifier of an instance of the digital product passport. Formatted according to EN18219.

productId.description: A unique string of characters for the identification of a product, that also enables a web link to the digital product passport. Formatted according to EN18219.

granularity.description: The level of granularity of the ProductID as per ESPR.

dppSchemaVersion.description: The reference standard the DPP instance schema refers to.

dppStatus.description: The status of the DPP instance as digital resource.

lastUpdated.description: The date and time of the latest update to the DPP instance. UTC-based timestamp.

economicOperatorId.description: A unique string of characters for the identification of an actor involved in a product’s life cycle. Formatted according to EN18219.

facilityId.description: A unique string of characters for the identification of locations or buildings involved in a product’s value chain. Formatted according to EN18219.

hsCode.description: A unique string of characters as per the hs Code requirements. Formatted according to EN18219.

delegatedActIds.description: An array of strings identifying relevant delegated acts, minimum size 1. Formatted according to EN18219.
